item.title: Autostart Tmux in iTerm2 - Improve Your Productivity
item.description: This post will introduce how to autostart Tmux when starting iTerm2. By default, every time you start iTerm2, you need to enter tmux attach to enter tmux mode. I use Tmux to manage workspaces for different projects. Common IDEs generally provide an interface for users to select projects. Naturally, can iTerm2 + Tmux have a similar function? Very simple!
